pageTitle: Best progressive-metal band poll - Metal Storm
textBeforeTable: The original post Total votes: 75 4 Pain Of Salvation 6 Riverside 7 Arcturus 7 Orphaned Land 7 Porcupine Tree 11 Ayreon 12 Symphony X 21 other Login or register to vote. other Riverside Arcturus Orphaned Land Symphony
textAfterTable: BloodTears ANA-thema Posts: 10078 Age: 29 From: Portugal   19.02.2010 at 11:24 Written by Dark Blood on 18.02.2010 at 18:49 Written by BloodTears on 18.02.2010 at 13:40 Written by Dark Blood on 18.02.2010 at 05:30 If we go with popularity and common knowledge.. of course Dream Theater's the father of Progressive metal. But since some of the bands in the poll have done really amazing works, I left DT and Opeth aside, and voted for Ayreon. I love Arjen's every work, and music nowadays needs more artists like him. Also want to mention Evergrey, I'm a big fan of their early works. And Riverside did a damn GREAT job in their last album... I was really amazed with it. Did you check out Riverside early albums? It's not JUST their last album that is good. Oh, yes I have all of them, and I specially like the debut album, Out
